special_text:
[+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them this turn.
[-2]: Gain control of target creature or planeswalker until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn. Lady Sigrid of Cardinal Court deals 4 damage to that permanent at the beginning of the next end step.
[-5]: Each opponent gets an emblem with “At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a permanent.”
